name: Bluebottle and the Dark Relics
description:
a mysterious organization stages a coup, and they're after a triptych of treasures, and there's only one plural jellyfish femme fatale who can stop them! but who is this girl, really? and why is she so sad?

this is a direct sequel/prequel to Princess Axolotl of Europa!

may contain some scary things like murder and poison and references to suicide and underage sex work but its still fun and cute
